markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Choral (Choir Angel)](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2815)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Choral angels are incredible singers who fill the halls of [Nirvana](/Planes.aspx?ID=44) with pious chants and sacred hymns. Most form from the souls of talented bards and other performers, though anyone who takes superlative joy in music might ascend to their ranks. Though their duties are typically to spread peace and joy through their music, their holy incantations also brim with mystic purpose, their songs bolstering angelic wards and strengthening the very fabric of the celestial planes themselves.

 While choral angels shy away from conflict, they will brave the mortal realm to deliver good omens and auspicious messages. Choral angels often serve the goddess [Shelyn](/Deities.aspx?ID=293), but they can also serve other good deities and empyreal lords.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Celestial](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=46)): DC 22

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 20

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Choral.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 6">[Choral](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2815)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Angel" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=530" />
<trait label="Celestial" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=551" />
<trait label="Holy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=517" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 15 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +14; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59)

**Languages**
[Diabolic](/Languages.aspx?ID=117), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Empyrean](/Languages.aspx?ID=115); [_truespeech_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1728)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +12, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +15, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) +17, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +14

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +4

**Con** +2

**Int** +3

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +5
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 24 

**Fort** +10 

**Ref** +14 

**Will** +16 

+1 status to all saves vs. [magic](/Traits.aspx?ID=644)
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 100

</row>

**Resistances**
[sonic](/Traits.aspx?ID=697) 5

**Weaknesses**
[unholy](/Traits.aspx?ID=521) 5

**Harmonizing Aura** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=542), [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=579), [sonic](/Traits.aspx?ID=697)) 20 feet. Allies in the aura gain a +2 status bonus to sonic damage rolls and a +1 status bonus to AC and all saves against effects with the [auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=541) or [sonic](/Traits.aspx?ID=697) trait. Enemies in the aura take a –2 status penalty to sonic damage rolls and a –1 status penalty to AC and all saves against sonic and auditory effects.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet, fly 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +14 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Holy](/Traits.aspx?ID=517), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 2d6+5 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
piercing hymn +17 ([Holy](/Traits.aspx?ID=517), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [range 90 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [Sonic](/Traits.aspx?ID=147)),
**Damage** 4d6 sonic damage plus deafening aria

**Divine Innate Spells** DC 23, attack +15
- **Cantrips (3rd)**
[Courageous Anthem](/Spells.aspx?ID=1763), [Uplifting Overture](/Spells.aspx?ID=1779)
- **1st**
[Counter Performance](/Spells.aspx?ID=381) (at will)
- **2nd**
[Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) (at will; self only), [Noise Blast](/Spells.aspx?ID=1616) (at will)
- **3rd**
[Cleanse Affliction](/Spells.aspx?ID=1467), [Clear Mind](/Spells.aspx?ID=1469) (at will), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), [Noise Blast](/Spells.aspx?ID=1616)
- **Constant (5th)**
[Truespeech](/Spells.aspx?ID=1728)

**Rituals** DC 23

- **1st**
[Angelic Messenger](/Rituals.aspx?ID=141)

**Deafening Aria**   On a critical hit with piercing hymn, the target is [deafened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=66) for 1 minute.

**Harmonize** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Sonic](/Traits.aspx?ID=147)) The choral angel lends their harmony to a choral angel ally within their harmonizing aura. The ally can, on their next turn, expend their 3rd-rank [_noise blast_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1616) to instead cast [_calm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1458), [_heroism_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1555), or 4th-rank _noise blast_. If the ally is benefiting from 5 or more chorals' Harmonize actions, they can instead choose [_divine decree_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1495).

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-359" />
name: Choral
